title: [45w#72] [osu!lazer] 2020.602.0 更新日志
author: 45gfg9
txt_content:
本帖最后由 45gfg9 于 2020-6-3 22:46 编辑 
osu!lazer 2020.602.0 [ruby=更新日志]Changelog[/ruby]
osu!lazer at GitHub
Release page
模版生成真的没人要吗
Beatmap Listing 谱面列表
[√] Fix searching by genre/language not working in beatmap listing overlay (osu#9149) author: EVAST9919
[√] 修复在铺面列表不能以流派/语言搜索 (osu#9149)

Code Quality 代码质量
[√] Remove necessity for custom mania interface caching (osu#9129) author: peppy
[√] 移除mania自定义界面缓存的必要 (osu#9129)
[√] Fix minor typo in OsuGameBase (osu#9137) author: peppy
[√] 修复OsuGameBase中误拼 (osu#9137)
[√] Split out IHasPath from IHasCurve to better define hitobjects (osu#9115) author: peppy
[√] 从IHasCurve中分离IHasPath以更好实现打击物件 (osu#9115)
[√] Move setter from EndTime to Duration (osu#9123) author: peppy
[√] 将setter从EndTime换到Duration (osu#9123)

Database 数据库
[+] Add the ability to export skins (osu#9101) author: peppy
[+] 增加导出皮肤的能力 (osu#9101)

Editor 编辑器
[√] Fix defaults not being applied correctly to blueprints after StartTime is changed (osu#9088) author: peppy
[√] 修复StartTime改变后默认不正确应用于蓝图 (osu#9088)
[√] Move distance snap grid to osu! HitObjectComposer (osu#9078) author: peppy
[√] 将距离捕捉网格移动到osu! HitObjectComposer (osu#9078)
[√] Cache EditorClock as its own type (osu#9083) author: peppy
[√] 缓存EditorClock为其类型 (osu#9083)
[√] Tween seeks in editor to allow for better visual context (osu#9084) author: peppy
[√] 变换编辑器中视图以允许更好的视觉上下文 (osu#9084)
[√] Remove unnecessary size propagation in HitObjectComposer (osu#9107) author: peppy
[√] 移除HitObjectComposer中不必要的大小扩展 (osu#9107)
[√] Allow SelectionHandler to provide custom context menu items without local hover check (osu#9112) author: peppy
[√] 允许SelectionHandler提供默认上下文菜单项而不需要局部悬浮检查 (osu#9112)
[√] Simplify scrolling ruleset editor implementation by adding base position support (osu#9108) author: peppy
[√] 以添加基位置支持简化滚动ruleset编辑器实现 (osu#9108)
[√] Allow HandleMovement by default (osu#9114) author: peppy
[√] 默认允许HandleMovement (osu#9114)
[√] Allow drag selections to occur from outside the playfield (osu#9126) author: peppy
[√] 允许拖拽选择在游玩范围外发生 (osu#9126)
[√] Hide non-alive selection blueprints by default (osu#9124) author: peppy
[√] 默认隐藏非激活的选择蓝图 (osu#9124)
[√] Fix saving in the editor causing the current beatmap to change after returning to song select (osu#9125) author: peppy
[√] 修复编辑器保存时当前谱面在返回到歌曲选择后改变 (osu#9125)
[√] Tidy up and complete xmldoc for HitObjectComposer (osu#9142) author: peppy
[√] 整理完成HigObjectComposer的xmldoc (osu#9142)
[√] Pass hitobjects as a parameter to CreateBlueprintContainer (osu#9143) author: peppy
[√] 将打击物件作为参数传给CreateBlueprintContainer (osu#9143)
[√] Implement osu!taiko editor (osu#9146) author: peppy
[√] 实现osu!taiko编辑器 (osu#9146)

Framework 框架
[+] Add method to open an arbitrary subdirectory in native explorer (osu-framework#3575) author: peppy
[+] 添加方法在本地文件浏览器打开任意子文件夹 (osu-framework#3575)
[√] Change BindableList to always use the item reference from the list itself in events (osu-framework#3583) author: peppy
[√] 修改BindableList永远在事件中使用列表本身的引用 (osu-framework#3583)
[+] Add missing System.Numerics reference for iOS tests project (osu-framework#3584) author: peppy
[+] 给iOS测试项目添加丢失的System.Numerics引用 (osu-framework#3584)
[√] Avoid Activator.CreateInstance when getting bound copy of BindableList (osu-framework#3587) author: peppy
[√] 当获取BindableList的绑定拷贝时避免Activator.CreateInstance (osu-framework#3587)
[√] Fix DSPFC not considering parent padding correctly (osu-framework#3593) author: smoogipoo
[√] 修复DSPFC未正确考虑父元素边框 (osu-framework#3593)
[√] Replace returning host assembly with NUnit current test assembly (osu-framework#3589) author: frenzibyte
[√] 将返回主机汇编替换为NUnit当前测试汇编 (osu-framework#3589)
[√] Shader-level texture wrap modes in conjunction with mipmapping and texture atlasses (osu-framework#3511) author: Tom94
[√] 着色器级材质包裹模式连接mipmap和材质纹理地图 (osu-framework#3511)
[√] Fix LogOverlay potentially showing entries out of order (osu-framework#3597) author: peppy
[√] 修复LogOverlay可能显示乱序项目 (osu-framework#3597)
[√] Replace any potential usage of Environment.CurrentDirectory (osu#9158) author: frenzibyte
[√] 修复任何可能的Environment.CurrentDirectory使用 (osu#9158)

Gameplay 游戏体验
[√] Fix osu!mania stage-left and stage-right sprites incorrectly scaling horizontallly (osu#9160) author: mcendu
[√] 修复osu!mania左舞台和右舞台精灵不正确地横向缩放 (osu#9160)
[√] Fix HP drain occurring in non-drain sections (osu#8632) author: frenzibyte
[√] 修复非掉血区域掉血 (osu#8632)

Platform 平台
[√] Fix opening to folder not working for subdirectories (osu#9102) author: peppy
[√] 修复打开文件夹不能打开子文件夹 (osu#9102)

Reliability 可靠性
[+] Add cancellation token support to CreateNestedHitObjects() (osu#9033) author: smoogipoo
[+] 给CreateNestedHitObjects()添加取消令牌支持 (osu#9033)
[√] Fix WeakList failure cases (osu-framework#3577) author: smoogipoo
[√] 修复WeakList错误情况 (osu-framework#3577)
[√] Replace any potential usage of Environment.CurrentDirectory with an immutable static property (osu-framework#3590) author: frenzibyte
[√] 替换所有可能的Environment.CurrentDirectory使用为不可变静态属性 (osu-framework#3590)

Results 结果
[√] Implement contracted score panel and integrate into results screen (osu#9086) author: smoogipoo
[√] 实现缩小的成绩面板并整合进结果屏幕 (osu#9086)
[√] Allow horizontal scroll on results screen when not hovering expanded panel (osu#9161) author: peppy
[√] 允许未悬浮扩展面板时在结果屏幕横向滚动 (osu#9161)

Testing 测试
[+] Add pdb to DynamicClassCompiler to show more info in stack trace (osu-framework#3574) author: Fuewburvpoa
[+] 给DynamicClassCompiler添加pdb以在栈追踪显示更多信息 (osu-framework#3574)
[√] Fix running osu.Game.Benchmarks (osu#9096) author: turbedi
[√] 修复osu.Game.Benchmarks运行 (osu#9096)
[√] Fix test failures on TestSceneUserDimBackgrounds (osu#9111) author: peppy
[√] 修复TestSceneUserDimBackgrounds测试失败 (osu#9111)
[+] Add test covering removing twice from a BindableList not firing events (osu-framework#3582) author: peppy
[+] 为BindableList中两次移除触发事件添加测试 (osu-framework#3582)

Tooling 工具
[√] Fix dynamic compilation not working for testscenes (osu-framework#3580) author: smoogipoo
[√] 修复动态编译在测试情况不工作 (osu-framework#3580)
[√] Ignore static classes in dynamic compilation (osu-framework#3581) author: smoogipoo
[√] 动态编译中忽略静态类 (osu-framework#3581)

Tournament 锦标赛
[+] Add custom resolution set option to tournament client (osu#9092) author: omkelderman
[+] 在锦标赛客户端添加自定义分辨率设置选项 (osu#9092)
